summary: The Protecting VA Employees Act aims to align the removal, demotion, and suspension policies for certain Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) employees with those of other federal employees. It repeals specific sections of Title 38 and Title 5 of the United States Code related to VA employee discipline processes, and restores certain disciplinary and grievance procedures for Veterans Health Administration personnel that were in place prior to the Department of Veterans Affairs Accountability and Whistleblower Protection Act of 2017.
